::English::
===========
PRO Xara Design (6.1.2.13287) Multilanguage

Xara Designer Pro (formerly Xtreme Pro) is the top of the range of products and includes all the features and web design templates and graphic design and photography. Besides adding additional features that designers need Pro includes support for PDF / X, PANTONE color separations, support for multi-core processors for more speed, more import / export filters, a professional version of the tool picture Xtreme more.Xara photos and is faster, simply, the world of graphics software, with truly flexible illustration tools and revolutionary photo handling. Photo composition is perfect.

Xara Xtreme is used by many different types of customers in a spectacular range of uses - for designs combining drawings, text and photos, for print and the Web - so we understand how important it is for compatibility with other products and users.

Xtreme offers support for a wide range of file formats, which facilitates the exchange of their work with other users and programs. This includes common types of bitmap (eg, GIF, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF, PSD, and RAW photos) and key vector types (eg PDF and AI / EPS, WMF and EMF /). For text Xara Xtreme supports RTF (Rich Text Format).

Xara Xtreme has full support for import and export files from Adobe Photoshop PSD, including layer support.

Xara Xtreme offers industry-leading export of super-clean, very compact PDF files (including support for graduated color fills and flat / graduated transparency).

Xara Xtreme Pro offers the ability to produce CMYK color separations. This includes on-screen preview of CMYK and spot color plates, PANTONE color support, spot colors, preview screen printer and a much wider.

Xara Xtreme Pro is compatible with XPS import and export. This is a totally new page description file format invented by Microsoft that's vector based, making it ideal as a portable document format independent of the resolution.

Xara Xtreme offers the easiest way to create really efficient Flash animations.

Xara Xtreme has the world's most sophisticated, highest performance vector rendering engine. It simply makes it the fastest graphics software found
